metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010305 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: libmspack 0.9.1alpha is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is:Information Disclosure. The component is: function chmd_read_headers() inlibmspack(file libmspack/mspack/chmd.c). The attack vector is: the victimmust open a specially crafted chm file. The fixed version is: after commit2f084136cfe0d05e5bf5703f3e83c6d955234b4d.

criterions.comment: libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
